BoardMembers.name: Isaac Sean
BoardMembers.title: Founder and Chairperson
BoardMembers.description: He holds a Bachelor's in Procurement and Chain Supply Management He brings expertise in procurement and supply chain management to the foundation. With a strong passion for creating opportunities for the marginalized, Isaac is a dedicated leader committed to making a positive impact in the community through collaborative efforts and strategic initiatives

BoardMembers.name: Damiana Indoshi Amwayi
BoardMembers.title: Founder and Deputy Chairperson
BoardMembers.description: She holds a Bachelor's in Food Nutrition and Dietetics Dedicated to serve and contribute to the society in ways that can help save life and needs of  people

BoardMembers.name: Billia Chenamba Pusikwang
BoardMembers.title: Founder and Secretary
BoardMembers.description: She holds a Bachelor of science in Agricultural Education and Extension Devoted to Initiate a smile on a face

BoardMembers.name: Rev. Sr. Barbra Adongo
BoardMembers.title: Founder
BoardMembers.description: Rev. Sr. Barbra Adongo together with the Franciscan Sisters of St. Joseph Asumbi (FSJ) and a Trustee of the Beacon of Compassion Charity Foundation (BCF). She is deeply committed to community Empowerment, focusing on educational and healthcare initiatives for vulnerable populations.With a degree in hospitality management, Rev. Sr. Barbra combines her organizational skills with a passion for community engagement. As a Trustee, she plays a key role in strategizing impactful programs that empower individuals and strengthen communities.

BoardMembers.name: Steve Odongo
BoardMembers.title: Founder and Finance Director
BoardMembers.description: He holds a bachelors degree in law. Besides that, Steve is a professional mediator. He is driven by an unwavering passion for compassion and service to to others. His vision is rooted in creating meaningful change and fostering hope within the community through impactful and sustainable solutions.

BoardMembers.name: Mum Karola Teschler
BoardMembers.title: Founder and Executive Director
BoardMembers.description: He holds a bachelors degree in law. Besides that, Steve is a professional mediator. He is driven by an unwavering passion for compassion and service to to others. His vision is rooted in creating meaningful change and fostering hope within the community through impactful and sustainable solutions.
